name: fabric-setevent
title: Fabric Set Event
description: This activity sets an event on a fabric block
author: Yueming Xu

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: name of the event to set

inputs.name: payload
inputs.description: event payload as JSON object or array

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized result string of the event, or error message

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: event name and payload, if the event is successfully set
